00026 #define SNPRINT_BUF_SIZE 128

00031 XCharInterface::XCharInterface(const char *name, bool runtime, const shared_ptr<XDriver> &driver) : 
00032     XInterface(name, runtime, driver), 
00033     m_bGPIBUseSerialPollOnWrite(true),
00034     m_bGPIBUseSerialPollOnRead(true),
00035     m_gpibWaitBeforeWrite(1),
00036     m_gpibWaitBeforeRead(2),
00037     m_gpibWaitBeforeSPoll(1),
00038     m_gpibMAVbit(0x10),
00039     m_serialBaudRate(9600),
00040     m_serialStopBits(2),
00041     m_script_send(create<XStringNode>("Send", true)),
00042     m_script_query(create<XStringNode>("Query", true))
00043 {
00044 #ifdef USE_GPIB
00045     device()->add("GPIB");
00046 #endif
00047     device()->add("SERIAL");
00048     device()->add("DUMMY");
00049   
00050     m_lsnOnSendRequested = m_script_send->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00051         shared_from_this(), &XCharInterface::onSendRequested);
00052     m_lsnOnQueryRequested = m_script_query->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00053         shared_from_this(), &XCharInterface::onQueryRequested);
00054 }
00055 void
00056 XCharInterface::setEOS(const char *str) {
00057     m_eos = str;
00058 }
00059          
00060 void
00061 XCharInterface::open() throw (XInterfaceError &)
00062 {        
00063     m_xport.reset();
00064     
00065     {
00066         shared_ptr<XPort> port;
00067     #ifdef USE_GPIB
00068         if(device()->to_str() == "GPIB") {
00069             port.reset(new XGPIBPort(this));
00070         }
00071     #endif
00072         if(device()->to_str() == "SERIAL") {
00073             port.reset(new XSerialPort(this));
00074         }
00075         if(device()->to_str() == "DUMMY") {
00076             port.reset(new XDummyPort(this));
00077         }
00078           
00079         if(!port) {
00080             throw XOpenInterfaceError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00081         }
00082           
00083         port->open();
00084         m_xport.swap(port);
00085     }
00086 }
00087 void
00088 XCharInterface::close() throw (XInterfaceError &)
00089 {
00090     m_xport.reset();
00091 }
00092 int
00093 XCharInterface::scanf(const char *fmt, ...) const {
00094     if(!buffer().size())
00095         throw XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00096     bool addednull = false;
00097     if(buffer().back() != '\0') {
00098         m_xport->buffer().push_back('\0');
00099         addednull = true;
00100     }
00101 
00102     int ret;
00103     va_list ap;
00104 
00105     va_start(ap, fmt);
00106 
00107     ret = vsscanf(&buffer()[0], fmt, ap);
00108 
00109     va_end(ap);
00110 
00111     if(addednull)
00112         m_xport->buffer().pop_back();
00113     return ret;    
00114 }
00115 double
00116 XCharInterface::toDouble() const throw (XConvError &) {
00117     double x;
00118     int ret = this->scanf("%lf", &x);
00119     if(ret != 1)
00120         throw XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00121     return x;
00122 }
00123 int
00124 XCharInterface::toInt() const throw (XConvError &) {
00125     int x;
00126     int ret = this->scanf("%d", &x);
00127     if(ret != 1)
00128         throw XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00129     return x;
00130 }
00131 unsigned int
00132 XCharInterface::toUInt() const throw (XConvError &) {
00133     unsigned int x;
00134     int ret = this->scanf("%u", &x);
00135     if(ret != 1)
00136         throw XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00137     return x;
00138 }

00141 XCharInterface::buffer() const {return m_xport->buffer();}

00143 void
00144 XCharInterface::send(const XString &str) throw (XCommError &)
00145 {
00146     this->send(str.c_str());
00147 }
00148 void
00149 XCharInterface::send(const char *str) throw (XCommError &)
00150 {
00151     XScopedLock<XCharInterface> lock(*this);
00152     try {
00153         dbgPrint(driver()->getLabel() + " Sending:\"" + dumpCString(str) + "\"");
00154         m_xport->send(str);
00155     }
00156     catch (XCommError &e) {
00157         e.print(driver()->getLabel() + i18n(" SendError, because "));
00158         throw e;
00159     }
00160 }
00161 void
00162 XCharInterface::sendf(const char *fmt, ...) throw (XInterfaceError &)
00163 {
00164     va_list ap;
00165     int buf_size = SNPRINT_BUF_SIZE;
00166     std::vector<char> buf;
00167     for(;;) {
00168         buf.resize(buf_size);
00169         int ret;
00170     
00171         va_start(ap, fmt);
00172     
00173         ret = vsnprintf(&buf[0], buf_size, fmt, ap);
00174     
00175         va_end(ap);
00176       
00177         if(ret < 0) throw XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00178         if(ret < buf_size) break;
00179       
00180         buf_size *= 2;
00181     }
00182   
00183     this->send(&buf[0]);
00184 }
00185 void
00186 XCharInterface::write(const char *sendbuf, int size) throw (XCommError &)
00187 {
00188     XScopedLock<XCharInterface> lock(*this);
00189     try {
00190         dbgPrint(driver()->getLabel() + formatString(" Sending %d bytes", size));
00191         m_xport->write(sendbuf, size);
00192     }
00193     catch (XCommError &e) {
00194         e.print(driver()->getLabel() + i18n(" SendError, because "));
00195         throw e;
00196     }
00197 }
00198 void
00199 XCharInterface::receive() throw (XCommError &)
00200 {
00201     XScopedLock<XCharInterface> lock(*this);
00202     try {
00203         dbgPrint(driver()->getLabel() + " Receiving...");
00204         m_xport->receive();
00205         ASSERT(buffer().size());
00206         dbgPrint(driver()->getLabel() + " Received;\"" + 
00207                  dumpCString((const char*)&buffer()[0]) + "\"");
00208     }
00209     catch (XCommError &e) {
00210         e.print(driver()->getLabel() + i18n(" ReceiveError, because "));
00211         throw e;
00212     }
00213 }
00214 void
00215 XCharInterface::receive(unsigned int length) throw (XCommError &)
00216 {
00217     XScopedLock<XCharInterface> lock(*this);
00218     try {
00219         dbgPrint(driver()->getLabel() + QString(" Receiving %1 bytes...").arg(length));
00220         m_xport->receive(length);
00221         dbgPrint(driver()->getLabel() + QString(" %1 bytes Received.").arg(buffer().size())); 
00222     }
00223     catch (XCommError &e) {
00224         e.print(driver()->getLabel() + i18n(" ReceiveError, because "));
00225         throw e;
00226     }
00227 }
00228 void
00229 XCharInterface::query(const XString &str) throw (XCommError &)
00230 {
00231     query(str.c_str());
00232 }
00233 void
00234 XCharInterface::query(const char *str) throw (XCommError &)
00235 {
00236     XScopedLock<XCharInterface> lock(*this);
00237     send(str);
00238     receive();
00239 }
00240 void
00241 XCharInterface::queryf(const char *fmt, ...) throw (XInterfaceError &)
00242 {
00243     va_list ap;
00244     int buf_size = SNPRINT_BUF_SIZE;
00245     std::vector<char> buf;
00246     for(;;) {
00247         buf.resize(buf_size);
00248         int ret;
00249     
00250         va_start(ap, fmt);
00251     
00252         ret = vsnprintf(&buf[0], buf_size, fmt, ap);
00253     
00254         va_end(ap);
00255       
00256         if(ret < 0) throw XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00257         if(ret < buf_size) break;
00258       
00259         buf_size *= 2;
00260     }
00261 
00262     this->query(&buf[0]);
00263 }
00264 void
00265 XCharInterface::onSendRequested(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00266 {
00267     shared_ptr<XPort> port = m_xport;
00268     if(!port)
00269         throw XInterfaceError(i18n("Port is not opened."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00270     port->send(m_script_send->to_str().c_str());
00271 }
00272 void
00273 XCharInterface::onQueryRequested(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00274 {
00275     shared_ptr<XPort> port = m_xport;    
00276     if(!port)
00277         throw XInterfaceError(i18n("Port is not opened."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00278     XScopedLock<XCharInterface> lock(*this);
00279     port->send(m_script_query->to_str().c_str());
00280     port->receive();
00281     m_lsnOnQueryRequested->mask();
00282     m_script_query->value(XString(&port->buffer()[0]));
00283     m_lsnOnQueryRequested->unmask();
00284 }
